lines.text: DUMMY
n , m , mini , maxi , minj and maxj are integers with mini = 500 , maxi = - 1 , minj = 500 and maxj = - 1
lines.code: int n , m , mini = 500 , maxi = - 1 , minj = 500 , maxj = - 1 ;

lines.text: ch = 2d array of characters with size 50 by 50
read n and m
for i = 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: assign value - 1 to the integer endj
for integer j = 0 to m exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < m ; j ++ )

lines.text: read ch [ i ] [ j ]
if ch [ i ] [ j ] is ' * ' , set endj to j
lines.code: if ( ch [ i ] [ j ] == ' * ' ) endj = j ;

lines.text: DUMMY
assign value 0 to the integer j
loop while j < m , incrementing j
if ch [ i ] [ j ] is equal to ' * ' , break
if endj ! = - 1
set maxj to endj if endj is greater than maxj
if j is less than minj set minj to j

for integer j = 0 to m exclusive

lines.text: create integer endi with value - 1
for integer i = 0 to n exclusive

lines.text: if ch [ i ] [ j ] is equal to ' * ' set endi to i

lines.text: assign value 0 to the integer i
loop while i < m , incrementing i
break if ch [ i ] [ j ] is equal to ' * '
if endi ! = - 1
if endi is greater than maxi , set maxi to endi
if i is less than mini , set mini to i
